system.availability: Scarce Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. When consumed, user can make additional attack when making "Multiple Attacks" Action. Afterwards gain a level of fatigue and make +0 Toughness Test or suffer -5 to Iniative for 1d5 Days. Lasts 50+2d10 Minutes, causes 1d5 Corruption. Can only use one Eldar Drug at a time.
system.cost: Non-Eldar make -20 Toughness Test or are stunned for 1d5 Rounds, if 4+ DoF also take 1d10 Damage (ignore armour+toughness). Eldar make test if taking multiple Eldar drugs.
